name: WeatherBot
0:
”Alexa, tell weather bot, give me the weather in Los Angeles.”
”Alexa, ask weather bot, what's the weather in New York City.”
”Alexa, tell weather bot, give me the weather in San Francisco.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weather bot
des: If you're interested in what the temperature highs and lows are in your city you can ask weather bot. Give it a valid city and it can tell you what the current temperature it is outside along with the expected high and low for the day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
